summary:
This mod just contains the nude patches for both the UNP and CBBE slim versions of Olivia Wilde - Standalone Follower and Housecarl Replacer which you can get from here 
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/29633/ << Standalone version
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/35521/ << Replacer version
descriptionHtml:
[b][size=4pt]1- Go to Olivia Wilde - Standalone Follower or Housecarl Replacer and pick 1 main file, either the CBBE Curvy version, UNP version or the CBBE Slim version
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/29633]Olivia Wilde - Standalone Follower[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/35521]Olivia Wilde - Housecarl Replacer[/url]

2- Download a nude patch that matches the body you picked

3- Install it with NMM, if it asks do you want to upgrade say NO, when it asks do you want to overwrite say yes to all ..[/b][/size]


IF you want to use the CBBE-Curvy BBP nude patch, the CBBE-Slim BBP nude patch or the UNP BBP Nude patch you must install a BBP skeleton and animations, 
Skeleton like >>
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26800]XP32 Maximum Skeleton[/url] 

Animations like >> 
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13272]Victorias High Heel walk Animation plus BBP[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/11447]Feminine Running and New Dash Animation[/url]


Full credit goes to Caliente for the [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2666/]CBBE[/url] body mesh
Full credit goes to Dimon99 for the [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6709]UNP[/url] body mesh
Full credit goes to turbosundance for the [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21199] UNP BBP[/url] Body mesh
